DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of the study is to estimate the proportion of children, born between the 01/01/2002 and the 06/23/200, living around Dieppe (cantons Dieppe est, Dieppe Ouest and Offranville), vaccinated by MenBVac, with a serum bactericidal activity against B:14,P1-7,16 clone related to a protection (>= 4), before and after the third MenBvac vaccination.
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity After Two Doses of Meningococcal Outer Membrane Vesicle Vaccine MenBVac
DOC.criteria: children born between 01/01/2000 and 06/23/2005, living in DieppeEst, DieppeOuest and Offranville, vaccinated twice by MenBVac parental authority(ies)assent no parental authority(ies)assent no blood sample during the third vaccination impossibility of third vaccination
